Lesson 10: Urban Land Cover Classification with Remotely Sensed Data

Published

December 31, 2024

Modified

March 26, 2025

Overview

In this lesson, you will learn how to perform land cover classification by using remotely sensed data and digital image analysis methods.

Content

  • Multi-spectral Classification for Urban Land Use/Land Cover (LULC) Mapping
    • Unsupervised classification
    • Supervised classification
    • OBIA – Object-Based Image Analysis(GEOBIA)
  • Urban LULC Change Detection
  • Urban Features Extraction techniques

Lesson Slides and Hands-on Notes

  • Lesson slides in html format.

  • Hands-on Exercise 10 in html format.

References

Articles

  • Sandipta Das . Dasharatha P Angadi (2022) “Land use land cover change detection and monitoring of urban growth using remote sensing and GIS techniques: a micro-level study” GeoJournal, Vol. 87, pp. 2101–2123.

  • Jane Ferah Gondwe, Sun Lin, Rodger Millar Munthali, “Analysis of Land Use and Land Cover Changes in Urban Areas Using Remote Sensing: Case of Blantyre City”, Discrete Dynamics in Nature and Society, vol. 2021, Article ID 8011565, 17 pages, 2021. https://doi.org/10.1155/2021/8011565

  • Geymen, Abdurrahman ; Baz, Ibrahim (2007) Monitoring urban growth and detecting land-cover changes on the Istanbul metropolitan area, Environmental Monitoring and Assessment, Vol.136 (1-3), p.449-459.

  • Yin, Jie et. al. (2010) Monitoring urban expansion and land use/land cover changes of Shanghai metropolitan area during the transitional economy (1979–2009) in China, Environmental Monitoring and Assessment, Vol.177 (1-4), p.609-621.

  • Praveen Kumar Mallupattu* and Jayarama Reddy Sreenivasula Reddy (2013) Analysis of Land Use/Land Cover Changes Using Remote Sensing Data and GIS at an Urban Area, Tirupati, India, The Scientific World Journal (online)

  • Ali Alzahrani and Awos Kanan (2022) “Machine Learning Approaches for Developing Land Cover Mapping” Applied Bionics and Biomechanics, Volume 2022, 8 pages.

  • Step-by-Step: Land Cover Change Detection through Supervised Classification.

  • Image Conversion to Reflectance using the Semi-Automatic Classification Plugin version 7

  • SCP Tips: Import ROIs from shapefile

  • SCP Tips: ROI Pointer

  • Accuracy Assesment In Quantum GIS || A complete Tutorial

QGIS Plugin

  • Semi-Automatic Classification Plugin (SCP) for QGIS
  • Orfeo toolbox Plugin for QGIS
  • OTB Plugin installation
  • Object-based Image classification in QGIS. This video tutorial demonstrates the use of OTB to perform Object-based Image classification (OBIA).
  • GEOBIA
  • GEOBIA - Geographic Object-Based Image Analysis. This video tutorial tutorial demonstrates the use GEOBIA QGIS plugin to perform Geographic Object-Based Image Analysis (GEOBIA).
  • dzetsaka: Classification tool supports Random Forest, KNN and SVM for supervised classification of multi-spectral satellite data.
  • Neural Network MLPClassifier provides a supervised classification method for multi-band passive optical remote sensing data based on the Neural Network MLPClassifier by scikit-learn.
  • GEOSYS Plugin
  • PCA4CD - PCA for change detection
  • buildseg: QGIS plugin for building extraction
  • Terminus
  • Tree Density Calculator
  • RS&GIS
